mapper.select: select * from comment_info c, user_info u where c.post_seq=#{post_seq} and c.u_email = u.u_email order by cmt_dt
mapper.insert: insert into comment_info values( comment_info_seq.nextval, #{post_seq}, #{cmt_content}, sysdate, #{u_email}, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update post_info set cmts = (select count(*) from comment_info where post_seq=#{post_seq}) where post_seq=#{post_seq}
